legalRepresentative: Name, surname of the legal representative

checkout.emailSent: Form has been sent to your email
checkout.errorSendingEmail: Error sending email. Please try again.

medicalHistory.agreementNotify: I give my consent to receive notifications about the need to register for procedures:
medicalHistory.agreementSmsAndEmail: I agree to receive SMS and email notifications about upcoming clinic visits:
medicalHistory.adverseReaction: Have you ever had an adverse reaction during dental treatment?
medicalHistory.diseases: Have you been treated/are being treated for any of the following conditions:
medicalHistory.thyroidDisease: Thyroid disease or other hormonal disorders
medicalHistory.allergies: Do you have any allergies to:
medicalHistory.bleeding: Do you bleed for a long time after injury?
medicalHistory.cancer: Have you been treated for cancer?
medicalHistory.smoking: Do you smoke? If yes, specify number of cigarettes per day
medicalHistory.pregnancy: Are you pregnant? If yes, specify month of pregnancy
medicalHistory.signatureType: signature of the patient or legal representative
medicalHistory.signatureApprove: I agree to the processing of my personal data in the information system:
medicalHistory.confirmation: I confirm that all information provided is correct. I am obliged to report any change in health status or medication to the dentist without being asked.
